title: U.S. Accuses Russia of ‘Weaponizing’ Food
description: President Biden said it was “outrageous” for Russia to withdraw from an agreement that allowed the export of grains from Ukrainian ports.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
media:description: A resident who survived seven months under Russian occupation, in a village in the Kherson region of Ukraine, on Saturday.
